CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Customer Purchase stage positioned above or below the In-Store Promotion stage?
SRP.A: The Customer Purchase stage is positioned {below} the In-Store Promotion stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Retail Placement?
VE.A: The value of stage Retail Placement is {4562}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Repeat Purchase?
VE.A: The value of stage Repeat Purchase is {1197}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Retail Placement, with a value of {4562}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Repeat Purchase, with a value of {1197}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Customer Purchase to stage Repeat Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {1010} Thousand Bottles from stage Customer Purchase to stage Repeat Purchase.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 2844? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Retail Placement} stage has {4562}, the {In-Store Promotion} stage has {3481}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 4021? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {In-Store Promotion} stage has {3481}, the {Customer Purchase} stage has {2207}, the {Repeat Purchase} stage has {1197}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 1702 and 2844? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase, or from stage Customer Purchase to Repeat Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {In-Store Promotion} to {Customer Purchase} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Customer Purchase to Repeat Purchase, from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion, or from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {In-Store Promotion} to stage {Customer Purchase} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {In-Store Promotion} and {Customer Purchase} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Customer Purchase} and {Repeat Purchase} stages.
